[ RFC 5419 ] 
                 +--------------+           +----------------------+
                 |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
                 |   |F-AAA |   |           |   |H-AAAH|           |
                 |   |      +-------------------+      |           |
                 |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
                 |       |      |           |      |               |
                 |       |      |           |      |               |
      +------+   |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
      |      |   |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
      |  MN  +- -|- -+ PDSN + --  --  --  --  - +  HA  |           |
      |      |   |   |  /FA |   |           |   |      |           |
      +------+   |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |              |           |                      |
                 +--------------+           +----------------------+
[ RFC 5419 ] 
                        Access Domain                  Home Domain
                  +--------------+           +----------------------+
                  |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                  |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
                  |   |F-AAA |   |           |   |H-AAA |           |
                  |   |      +-------------------+      |           |
                  |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
                  |       |      |           |      |               |
                  |       |      |           |      |               |
       +------+   |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
       |      |   |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
       |  MN  +- -|- -+ PDSN + --  --  --  --  - +  HA  |           |
       |      |   |   |  /AR |   |           |   |      |           |
       +------+   |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                  |              |           |                      |
                  +--------------+           +----------------------+
[ RFC 5419 ] 
     MN                                    HA                    H-AAA
      |              BU to HA (4)           | RADIUS Access-ReQ(5)
      |------------------------------------>|------------------->|(6)
      | (includes NAI option, MN-ID option, |                    |
      | Mesg ID option, MN-AAA auth option) |RADIUS Access Accept|(7)
      |
                                            |<-------------------|
      |                                     |                    |
      |                             HA/AAAH authenticates MN
      |
      |                                     |(8)
      |
      |                                     |
      |
      |              BAck to MN    (9)        |
      |
      |<------------------------------------|--------------------|
      | (including MN-ID option,            | (10)
      |  Message ID option,                 |
      |  MN-HA auth options)                |                    |
[ RFC 5424 ] 
 +---------------------+    +---------------------+
 |  content            |    |  content            |
 |---------------------|    |---------------------|
 |  syslog application |    |  syslog application | (originator,
 |                     |    |                     |  collector, relay)
 |---------------------|    |---------------------|
 |  syslog transport   |    |  syslog transport   | (transport sender,
 |                     |    |                     | (transport receiver)
 +---------------------+    +---------------------+
           ^                          ^
           |                          |
            --------------------------
[ RFC 5424 ] 
            +----------+         +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Collector|
            +----------+         +---------+

            +----------+         +-----+         +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Relay|---->----|Collector|
            +----------+         +-----+         +---------+

            +----------+     +-----+            +-----+     +---------+
            |Originator|-->--|Relay|-->--..-->--|Relay|-->--|Collector|
            +----------+     +-----+            +-----+     +---------+

            +----------+         +-----+         +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Relay|---->----|Collector|
            |          |-+       +-----+         +---------+
            +----------+  \
                           \     +-----+         +---------+
                            +->--|Relay|---->----|Collector|
                                 +-----+         +---------+

            +----------+         +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Collector|
            |          |-+       +---------+
            +----------+  \
                           \     +-----+         +---------+
                            +->--|Relay|---->----|Collector|
                                 +-----+         +---------+

            +----------+         +-----+            +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Relay|---->-------|Collector|
            |          |-+       +-----+        +---|         |
            +----------+  \                    /    +---------+
                           \     +-----+      /
                            +->--|Relay|-->--/
                                 +-----+

            +----------+         +-----+                   +---------+
            |Originator|---->----|Relay|---->--------------|Collector|
            |          |-+       +-----+                +--|         |
            +----------+  \                            /   +---------+
                           \     +------------+       /
                            \    |+----------+|      /
                             +->-||Relay     ||->---/
                                 |+----------||    /
                                 ||Originator||->-/
                                 |+----------+|
                                 +------------+
[ RFC 5433 ] 
   +--------+                                     +--------+
   |        |                EAP-Request/Identity |        |
   |  EAP   |<------------------------------------|  EAP   |
   |  peer  |                                     | server |
   |        | EAP-Response/Identity               |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-1 |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-2                 |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-3 |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-4                 |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |          EAP-Success                |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   +--------+                                     +--------+
[ RFC 5433 ] 
   +--------+                                     +--------+
   |        |                EAP-Request/Identity |        |
   |  EAP   |<------------------------------------|  EAP   |
   |  peer  |                                     | server |
   |        | EAP-Response/Identity               |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-1 |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/EAP-NAK                |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |          EAP-Failure                |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   +--------+                                     +--------+
[ RFC 5433 ] 
   +--------+                                     +--------+
   |        |                EAP-Request/Identity |        |
   |  EAP   |<------------------------------------|  EAP   |
   |  peer  |                                     | server |
   |        | EAP-Response/Identity               |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-1 |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-2                 |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Request/GPSK-Fail               |        |
   |        | (PSK Not Found or Authentication    |        |
   |        | Failure)                            |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-Fail              |        |
   |        | (PSK Not Found or Authentication    |        |
   |        | Failure)                            |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |          EAP-Failure                |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   +--------+                                     +--------+
[ RFC 5433 ] 
   +--------+                                     +--------+
   |        |                EAP-Request/Identity |        |
   |  EAP   |<------------------------------------|  EAP   |
   |  peer  |                                     | server |
   |        | EAP-Response/Identity               |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-1 |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-2                 |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Request/GPSK-Fail               |        |
   |        | (Authentication Failure)            |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-Fail              |        |
   |        | (Authentication Failure)            |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        |          EAP-Failure                |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   +--------+                                     +--------+
[ RFC 5433 ] 
   +--------+                                     +--------+
   |        |                EAP-Request/Identity |        |
   |  EAP   |<------------------------------------|  EAP   |
   |  peer  |                                     | server |
   |        | EAP-Response/Identity               |        |
   |        |------------------------------------>|        |

   |        |                  EAP-Request/GPSK-1 |        |

   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Response/GPSK-2                 |        |

   |        | EAP-Request/                        |        |

   |        | (Authorization Failure)             |        |
   |        |<------------------------------------|        |
   |        |                                     |        |
   |        | EAP-Request/                        |        |
   |        | GPSK-Protected-Fail                 |        |

[ RFC 5438 ] 
      +--------------+                        +--------------+
      |  IM Sender   |                        | IM Recipient |
      |IMDN Recipient|                        | IMDN Sender  |
      +--------------+                        +--------------+
              |                                       |
              |                                       |
              |         1. IM requesting IMDN         |
              |-------------------------------------->|
              |                                       |

              |         2. IMDN (disposition)         |
              |<--------------------------------------|
              |                                       |
              |                                       |
[ RFC 5439 ] 
        PE      PE  PE     PE  PE      PE
           \      \/         \/       /
        PE--P(2)  P(2)      P(2)  P(2)--PE
                \ |            | /
                 \|            |/
       PE--P(2)---P(1)------P(1)---P(2)--PE
          /           \    /           \
        PE             \  /             PE
                        \/
                        P(1)
                        /|\
                       / | \
                      /  |  \
              PE--P(2)  P(2) P(2)--PE
                  /      /\      \
                PE     PE  PE     PE
[ RFC 5439 ] 
                PE    PE           PE   PE
       PE PE PE | PE  | PE  PE  PE |  PE | PE
         \|    \|/    |/    |     \|    \|/
       PE-P-----P-----P-----P------P-----P--PE
          |     |     |     |      |     |\
          |     |     |     |      |     | PE
          |     |     |     |      |     |
       PE-P-----P-----P-----P------P-----P
         /|    /|\    |\    |\     |\     \
       PE PE PE | PE  | PE  | PE   | PE    PE
                PE    PE    PE     PE
[ RFC 5439 ] 
      PE PE  PE PE PE PE PE PE PE PE PE PE PE PE  PE PE
        \|     \|    \|    \|   |/    |/    |/     |/
         P(2)   P(2) P(2) P(2) P(2) P(2) P(2)     P(2)
             \      \  |   \    /    |  /        /
      PE      \      \ |    \  /     | /        /       PE
        \      \      \|     \/      |/        /       /
      PE-P(2)---P(1)---P(1)---P(1)---P(1)---P(1)---P(2)-PE
                |      |      |      |      |
                |      |      |      |      |
                |      |      |      |      |

        /      /     / |     /\      |\        \       \
      PE      /     /  |    /  \     | \        \       PE

[ RFC 5439 ] 
         :    :    :    :    :    :
         :    :    :    :    :    :

             \|     \/      |/
        ......P(1)---P(1)---P(1)......

         :    :    :    :    :    :
[ RFC 5439 ] 
   Example| Count | Unmodified    | 2-Layer
          |       | (Section 5.1) | Hierarchy
   -------+-------+---------------+----------
   A      | L(2)  |      39580    |   39678
          | L(1)  |     356000    |     890
   -------+-------+---------------+----------
   B      | L(2)  |      79580    |   79778
          | L(1)  |     756000    |    1890

        Count | Unmodified  |  MP2P
        ------+-------------+----------
        X(PE) |     1998    |   3996
        X(2)  |    39780    |  11000
        X(1)  |   378000    |  11800

              |  Hierarchy  |
        ------+-------------+----------
        X(PE) |     1998    |   3996
        X(2)  |    39978    |  11000
        X(1)  |     3780    |  11800

          |       |            | Hierarchy  | Hierarchy   |

          | X(1)  |   1554820  |   572266   |     2226    |  12580

          | X(1)  |   5032000  |  1433998   |     3898    |  26000

[ RFC 5440 ] 
               +-+-+                 +-+-+
               |PCC|                 |PCE|
               +-+-+                 +-+-+
                 |                     |
                 | Open msg            |
                 |--------             |
                 |        \   Open msg |
                 |         \  ---------|
                 |          \/         |
                 |          /\         |
                 |         /  -------->|
                 |        /            |
                 |<------     Keepalive|
                 |             --------|
                 |Keepalive   /        |
                 |--------   /         |
                 |        \/           |
                 |        /\           |
                 |<------   ---------->|
                 |                     |
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                     +-+-+                  +-+-+
                     |PCC|                  |PCE|
                     +-+-+                  +-+-+
   1) Path computation |                      |
      event            |                      |
   2) PCE Selection    |                      |
   3) Path computation |---- PCReq message--->|
      request sent to  |                      |
      the selected PCE |                      |
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                 +-+-+                  +-+-+
                 |PCC|                  |PCE|
                 +-+-+                  +-+-+
                   |                      |
                   |---- PCReq message--->|
                   |                      |1) Path computation
                   |                      |   request received
                   |                      |
                   |                      |2) Path successfully
                   |                      |   computed
                   |                      |
                   |                      |3) Computed paths
                   |                      |   sent to the PCC
                   |                      |
                   |<--- PCRep message ---|
                   |    (Positive reply)  |
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                 +-+-+                  +-+-+
                 |PCC|                  |PCE|
                 +-+-+                  +-+-+
                   |                      |
                   |                      |
                   |---- PCReq message--->|
                   |                      |1) Path computation
                   |                      |   request received
                   |                      |
                   |                      |2) No Path found that
                   |                      |   satisfies the request
                   |                      |
                   |                      |3) Negative reply sent to
                   |                      |   the PCC (optionally with
                   |                      |   various additional
                   |                      |   information)
                   |<--- PCRep message ---|
                   |   (Negative reply)   |
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                       +-+-+                  +-+-+
                       |PCC|                  |PCE|
                       +-+-+                  +-+-+
   1) Path computation   |                      |
      event              |                      |
   2) PCE Selection      |                      |
   3) Path computation   |---- PCReq message--->|
      request X sent to  |                      |4) Path computation
      the selected PCE   |                      |   request queued
                         |                      |
                         |                      |
   5) Path computation   |                      |
      request X cancelled|                      |
                         |---- PCNtf message -->|
                         |                      |6) Path computation
                         |                      |   request X cancelled
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                       +-+-+                  +-+-+
                       |PCC|                  |PCE|
                       +-+-+                  +-+-+
   1) Path computation   |                      |
      event              |                      |
   2) PCE Selection      |                      |
   3) Path computation   |---- PCReq message--->|
      request X sent to  |                      |4) Path computation
      the selected PCE   |                      |   request queued
                         |                      |
                         |                      |
                         |                      |5) PCE gets overloaded
                         |                      |
                         |                      |
                         |                      |6) Path computation
                         |                      |   request X cancelled
                         |                      |
                         |<--- PCNtf message----|
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                      +-+-+                  +-+-+
                      |PCC|                  |PCE|
                      +-+-+                  +-+-+
   1) Path computation  |                      |
      event             |                      |
   2) PCE Selection     |                      |
   3) Path computation  |---- PCReq message--->|
      request X sent to |                      |4) Reception of a
      the selected PCE  |                      |   malformed object
                        |                      |
                        |                      |5) Request discarded
                        |                      |
                        |<-- PCErr message  ---|
                        |                      |
[ RFC 5440 ] 
                          +-+-+-+-+-+-+<------+
                   +------| SessionUP |<---+  |
                   |      +-+-+-+-+-+-+    |  |
                   |                       |  |
                   |   +->+-+-+-+-+-+-+    |  |
                   |   |  | KeepWait  |----+  |
                   |   +--|           |<---+  |
                   |+-----+-+-+-+-+-+-+    |  |
                   ||          |           |  |
                   ||          |           |  |
                   ||          V           |  |
                   ||  +->+-+-+-+-+-+-+----+  |
                   ||  |  | OpenWait  |-------+
                   ||  +--|           |<------+
                   ||+----+-+-+-+-+-+-+<---+  |
                   |||         |           |  |
                   |||         |           |  |
                   |||         V           |  |
                   ||| +->+-+-+-+-+-+-+    |  |
                   ||| |  |TCPPending |----+  |
                   ||| +--|           |       |
                   |||+---+-+-+-+-+-+-+<---+  |
                   ||||        |           |  |
                   ||||        |           |  |
                   ||||        V           |  |
                   |||+--->+-+-+-+-+       |  |
                   ||+---->| Idle  |-------+  |
                   |+----->|       |----------+
                   +------>+-+-+-+-+
[ RFC 5441 ] 
   Example:
   <---- area 1 ----><---- area 0 -----><------ area 2 ------>
                                       ABR1-A-B-+
                                        |       |
                                       ABR2-----D
                                        |       |
                                       ABR3--C--+
[ RFC 5442 ]

                      | Other    |
                  +---| Mobile   |<--+
                  |   | Enablers |   |
                  |   |__________|   |
                  |ME-4              |ME-3
                 _v____           ___v____        ________
                |      |ME-1     |        |      |        |
                | MEM  |-------->|  MEM   |  I2  |  Email |
                |Client|     ME-2| Server |<---->| Server |

                                     ^
                                     |ME-5

                 |Notif.              ^
                 |Protocol            |
                 |                 ___|______
                 |                |          |                 _____
               __v__    IMAP      | LEMONADE |      ESMTP     |     |
              |     |<----------->| IMAP     |<---------------| MTA |
              | MUA |-            | Store    |                |_____|
              |_____| \           |__________|
